publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5163 Dennis Canavan: Centenary of the Death of Michael Davitt—That the Parliament hails the enormous contribution of Michael Davitt to land reform in his native Ireland; notes the great acclaim with which he was greeted during his visit to Scotland in 1887 to pledge support for Scottish crofters in their struggle for land reform; congratulates the organisers of recent events in Portree to commemorate Davitt’s visit and the centenary of his death, and believes that the Scottish Executive and the Parliament together must ensure that land reform continues to be on our agenda. Supported by: John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Jim Mather*, Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-5163 Centenary of the Death of Michael Davitt (lodged on 15 November 2006) John Swinburne*, Michael McMahon*, Alex Neil*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Brian Adam*, Carolyn Leckie*, Rosie Kane*, Frances Curran*, Eleanor Scott*, Fiona Hyslop*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-5163 Dennis Canavan: Centenary of the Death of Michael Davitt—That the Parliament hails the enormous contribution of Michael Davitt to land reform in his native Ireland; notes the great acclaim with which he was greeted during his visit to Scotland in 1887 to pledge support for Scottish crofters in their struggle for land reform; congratulates the organisers of recent events in Portree to commemorate Davitt’s visit and the centenary of his death, and believes that the Scottish Executive and the Parliament together must ensure that land reform continues to be on our agenda. Supported by: John Farquhar Munro, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Jim Mather, Bruce Crawford, Rob Gibson, John Swinburne, Michael McMahon, Alex Neil, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Brian Adam, Carolyn Leckie, Rosie Kane, Frances Curran, Eleanor Scott, Fiona Hyslop, Chris Ballance, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-5163 Centenary of the Death of Michael Davitt (lodged on 15 November 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-5163 Centenary of the Death of Michael Davitt (lodged on 15 November 2006) Linda Fabiani*
